entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rondeau (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
